accessibility.text: Introduction: Magnetic Field in the Solar Corona
There are a lot of specific topological domains of the B field in the solar corona,
e.g. The critical point and other separatrix of the B field can define these topologies.
The boundary of each topological domain is a favor place for non-ideal process,
